abstract: Despite the decline, Citigroup showed progress in its expense management and strength in investment banking.
snippet: Despite the decline, Citigroup showed progress in its expense management and strength in investment banking.
lead_paragraph: Citigroup said yesterday that its first-quarter earnings fell 11 percent because of a big charge for its recently announced overhaul. But the results showed progress in its expense management and strength in investment banking, and its shares rose 2.6 percent.

headline.main: Profit Off 11% at Citigroup on Expenses of Overhaul
headline.print_headline: Profit Off 11% At Citigroup On Expenses Of Overhaul
